appShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the app's name.

appDescription.message: Mark students' exams through highlights and go!

browserActionTitle.description: The title of the browser action button

backToWorkspace.description: Text for link to return to workspace in sidebar

noEvidencesFoundForMarkingTitle.message: No evidences found for this mark

noEvidencesFoundForMarkingText.message: You haven't annotated any evidence for this mark, would you like to grade this student with $1?
